text:
Can a text input area be added to the FTP sampler GUI, such that file contents to be uploaded can be cut/pasted in. This text should also supports JMeter  variables. 

This would bring the FTP sampler features in line with other samplers (JDBC, HTTP, SOAP/XML-RPC).

Thanks for the suggestion.

Implemented in SVN r642552.
